ABOUTWORKCONTACT

Hey I'm Oskar

I’ve been pursuing web design and development since the days of MySpace, and earlier this year I graduated from Epicodus, a fantastic dev bootcamp in downtown Portland.

I’m passionate about building remarkable and innovative user experiences, and constantly learning new tools, techniques, libraries, and languages. Currently I'm exploring functional programming and teaching myself React, Redux, and Webpack.

When I’m not writing code, learning, or working in Sketch and Illustrator I like to bike, rock climb, read sci-fi, paint, write, and draw.

Send me an email if you want to work together on any projects!
